## IMGUI.requestFocus() method

Sets `focusID` to given `id` if the component can receive focus. Returns true if component is focused.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
requestFocus(id: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
